title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marketo's Digital Transformation (ISV201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marketo的数字化转型 (ISV201)
abstract: Enterprise SaaS migration at scale presents unique challenges in maintaining service availability while modernizing infrastructure. Adobe Marketo, serving 5,000+ enterprise customers, migrated one of the largest marketing platform solutions to AWS, improving customer experience by reducing query times and increasing uptime. This talk explores Marketo's end-to-end migration journey, including a 35TB database migration to Amazon Aurora, creation of a migration factory for customer migrations, and modernization using Amazon EKS for container orchestration. Learn practical approaches to large-scale cloud migrations, AWS accelerator programs, risk mitigation strategies, maintaining business continuity, and lessons learned applicable to both technical teams and business leaders planning digital transformation initiatives.
abstract_cn: 大规模企业SaaS迁移在现代化基础设施的同时保持服务可用性方面面临独特挑战。Adobe Marketo为5,000多家企业客户提供服务,将最大的营销平台解决方案之一迁移到AWS,通过缩短查询时间和提高正常运行时间改善了客户体验。本次演讲探讨了Marketo的端到端迁移历程,包括将35TB数据库迁移到Amazon Aurora、创建客户迁移工厂,以及使用Amazon EKS进行容器编排的现代化改造。了解大规模云迁移的实用方法、AWS加速器计划、风险缓解策略、维护业务连续性,以及适用于规划数字化转型计划的技术团队和业务领导者的经验教训。
